GRANTS ANALYSIS METADATA: This dataset (grants_analysis.csv) contains federal science grant award records from FY 2018–2025 sourced from USAspending.gov.
Each row represents one awarded grant, including financial details, agency information, performance period, recipient location, and cancellation status (derived).
This dataset was cleaned in cleaning.Rmd and analyzed in analysis.Rmd to explore trends in funding, grant volume, and cancellation rates.

column2: Dollar amount of funding committed (obligated) by the federal agency at award time.
Original date the award was granted (used to derive fiscal year).
Official start date of the grant’s performance period.
Current planned end date of the grant’s performance period.
Category of funding type (e.g., Project Grant (B), Cooperative Agreement (C)); used to filter projects.
Fiscal year of the award, derived from award_base_action_date.
Number of days between project start and end dates (derived from performance period dates).
Variable indicating whether the grant was cancelled (based on negative obligated amount).
Labeled version of cancelled for plotting (“Cancelled / Net de-obligation”).
Log10-transformed version of total_obligated_amount (for non-normal funding distribution).
Count of grants within each fiscal year or period (generated in summarization).
Number of cancelled grants per fiscal year or time period (derived in summary tables).
Percent of cancelled grants per fiscal year or time period (cancelled_grants / total_grants * 100).
